trans-unit.source: Provides data for touch input events.
trans-unit.target: 提供觸控輸入事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following events use <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 使用下列事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> events that occur on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>所發生的事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: It checks the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Captured%2A> property to verify that the device that raised the event is captured to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 它會檢查<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Captured%2A>屬性，確認裝置引發事件會擷取至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: If it is, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> is released.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>釋放。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is available in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The input device to associate with this event.
trans-unit.target: 與這個事件關聯的輸入裝置。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的時間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 會定義座標空間的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns all touch points that were collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: 傳回最後兩次觸控事件期間收集到的所有觸控點。

trans-unit.source: All touch points that were collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: 最後兩次觸控事件期間收集到的所有觸控點。

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 會定義座標空間的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前觸控裝置相對於指定之項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: The current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 目前觸控裝置相對於指定之項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 以特定型別的方式呼叫的泛型處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The target on which to call the handler.
trans-unit.target: 要對其呼叫處理常式的目標。

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as an <xref:System.EventHandler%601> of type <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式時為<xref:System.EventHandler%601>型別的<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs>然後再叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the touch that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得產生事件的觸控。

trans-unit.source: The touch that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 產生事件的觸控。

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> events that occur on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>所發生的事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: It checks the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Captured%2A> property to verify that the device that raised the event is captured to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 它會檢查<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Captured%2A>屬性，確認裝置引發事件會擷取至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: If it is, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> is released.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>釋放。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is available in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>類別概觀。
